snippet.title: Angels with Scaly Wings - Launch Trailer feat. Shinji Hosoe
snippet.description:
Buy here to receive both the DRM-free version + Steam key: http://angelswithscalywings.com

Steam: http://http://store.steampowered.com/app/571880/

You, the player, are an ambassador for Earth sent through a mysterious portal into the world of dragons. Explore a town full of secrets and the people who keep them in this compelling sci-fi visual novel with slice of life and dating sim elements. 

Social Media

http://twitter.com/ScalyWings

http://angelsWithScalyWings.tumblr.com/

http://facebook.com/AngelsWithScalyWings
